options.content:
# CPU placeholder

Metrics from the Temporal SDK should be complemented with the workers' CPU and memory usage statistics.

# Memory placeholder

Metrics from the Temporal SDK should be complemented with the workers' CPU and memory usage statistics.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (namespace, operation, task_queue, le) (rate(temporal_request_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (namespace, operation, task_queue, le) (rate(temporal_long_request_latency_seconds_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])))
